alert.note: Alert for Grant; Owen; Pendleton (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 7:37AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN GRANT, SOUTHEASTERN OWEN AND SOUTHERN PENDLETON COUNTIES THROUGH 800 AM EST... At 736 AM EST, a strong thunderstorm was located 10 miles southeast of Owenton, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Williamstown, Falmouth, Owenton, Morgan, Corinth, Monterey, Stewartsville, Elk Lake, Beechwood, Natlee, Camp Northward, New Columbus, Elmer Davis Lake, Goforth, Harmony, Cherry Grove, Williamstown Lake, Marcus, Keefer and Catawba. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
